channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The number of abortions kept rising in 2024 because of telehealth prescriptions, report finds
item.description: A new report finds that the number of abortions in the U.S. grew in 2024 as more women obtained pills through telehealth.
